summary: Project involves a committee management app with branding and location data. UI changes include displaying committee name near logo on left side, and correcting spelling from 'जैनपुर' to 'जौनपुर'.

existing_features.title: In the Header component, display the committee name text next to/below the logo on the left side of the header, so it is visible alongside the logo branding.

Replace all occurrences of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' across all frontend files, including Header, Footer, HeroSection, ContactSection, index.html, and any other component or config file where this text appears.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display committee name near logo on left side of UI

projectName: Display committee name near logo and fix Jaunpur spelling
